definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a turning aside, defection, apostasy, withdrawal;—alw. abs. ´[[ס]];—
defection, used appar. of any moral or legal offence De 19:16, so prob. Is 59:13 (+ [[עשֶׁק]], [[דִּבְרֵי שָָׁקֶר]]).
apostasy, De 13:6, Is 1:5, Is 31:6, Je 28:16, Je 29:32.
[[סָרָה בִּלְתִּי]] non-withdrawal Is 14:6 (cf. vb., v:Is 14:25, Am 6:7).
